item.title: Coffee Ratings
item.description: Intro Today I am going to explore Coffee Ratings for this week’s Tidy Tuesday challenge. library(tidytuesdayR) library(tidyverse) ## ── Attaching packages ──────────────────────── tidyverse 1.3.0 ── ## ✓ ggplot2 3.3.2 ✓ purrr 0.3.4 ## ✓ tibble 3.0.1 ✓ dplyr 1.0.0 ## ✓ tidyr 1.1.0 ✓ stringr 1.4.0 ## ✓ readr 1.3.1 ✓ forcats 0.5.0 ## ── Conflicts ─────────────────────────── tidyverse_conflicts() ── ## x dplyr::filter() masks stats::filter() ## x dplyr::lag() masks stats::lag() library(tidymodels) ## ── Attaching packages ─────────────────────── tidymodels 0.
